Name: Tales of Novariel
About the game: The land of Novariel is a vast and peaceful one. But one day slimes in different colors and clothing appeared and made the once peaceful world a dangerous one. Create your hero and fight against the slimes! Free the cities, help the lost citizens and explore a vast world ready for you. This game is a singleplayer RPG with 2D graphics in a 3D world. It features a charactercreation, round based combat and an endless world. IMPORTANT: The following content gets updatet as soon as I add more stuff to the game World generation The world is procedurally generated and offers currently the following tile-types: City: A place to rest, get quests and enjoy the little town-feeling Forest: Filled with mostly trees. But stones and slimes are available too Plain: Almost empty tile to relax the eye Stone: Filled with mostly stones. But trees and slimes are available too More tiles are planned Races Choose between the following races: Human: The basic race. Dwarf: Small but strong, always ready to fight. Elf: Fragile but agile. Never angry an elf with a bow. Giant: The biggest race in Novariel. Stupid but dangerous. Goblin: The rarest race. You want to challenge yourself? Play a Goblin. Classes Choose between the following classes: Warrior: You want a sword? Take it. Mage: -Weird magic noises- Thief: Why are my pockets always filled with gold?
